website_summaries.verdict: Huge commercial sized fan that will move plenty of air in any location.
pros: Has a large and powerful motor that's sure to give you a long-lasting performance
With a 30-inch diameter, it's one of the larger wall fans you can purchase at this price point
Sturdy cage around the fan will keep you safe from the spinning blades
cons: May be too large for some people to hang properly

customer_reviews.title: Great for the garage
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my garage, so far they work great. kicks out a ton of air and helps keep the bugs out at night. A minor complaint is that they can get kind of load but its not the motor itself, its the air moving. i can live with that as long as I'm not getting eaten alive by mosquitos. i will likely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: I purchased 3 for my patio and they are so ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 for my patio and they are so very loud we can't hear each other have a conversation, I got online and tried to return but was going to be charged $90.00 and didn't not want to pay that to return. So make sure you dont order these for your patio or where you want to hear someone speak. On a positive note they do provide lots of wind. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a garage gym
customer_reviews.text: There was some assembly required which I didn’t expect but it was pretty straightforward. I installed it against a wall aimed at where my head would be during squat and deadlift in a garage gym. It is very loud but so worth it as it is getting hotter outside. It feels glorious.
customer_reviews.author: fuzzbusterfl

customer_reviews.title: This fan works
customer_reviews.text: I am not the type of person that reviews thing but in this case. We have a shop that isn't air conditioned and its been a hot summer and this fan has really come in handy. Moves the air well with little noise. I just purchased another on this morning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My guys love them.
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my shop and the guys love them, they work well and they were easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McInerney

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, great price
customer_reviews.text: Fans work great. Install them all over our plant and they work well. Price is typically lower than comptetiors
customer_reviews.author: drum_24

customer_reviews.title: High power fan with 3 speeds. Great for garage!
customer_reviews.text: High power fan with 3 speeds. Great for garage, easy to assemble and affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: great fan
customer_reviews.text: I liked the very high speed and moved lots of air.
customer_reviews.author: luther pendergrass

customer_reviews.title: Big but loud.
customer_reviews.text: We use these in a garage. The move a lot of air and provide great circulation but they are loud. Especially in the garage. Outdoors not so much.
customer_reviews.author: orlandotx

customer_reviews.title: Adds enough coolin power.
customer_reviews.text: Summer Fan for boosting the AC in high ceiling conditions
customer_reviews.author: P. Joiner

customer_reviews.title: THESE FANS WORK GREAT IN MY SHOP I BOUGHT 7 OF THEM FOR ...
customer_reviews.text: THESE FANS WORK GREAT IN MY SHOP I BOUGHT 7 OF THEM FOR MY EMPLOYEES AND TURNED AROUND AND BOUGHT 7 MORE. I GIVE 5 STARS ON THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: WORSINC.

customer_reviews.title: This fan is the way to go it has 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: This fan is the way to go it has 3 speeds and pushes air and works well I have 2 for my detailing shop a am going to get two more soon
customer_reviews.author: Derek catalano

customer_reviews.title: Do not work
customer_reviews.text: Fans did not push air as advertised. Returned the 4 we bought. Amazon was nice enough to take them back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TPI Corporation Single Phase Wall Mount Commercial Circulator – 30" Diameter, 120 Volt Exhaust Fan – Ventilation Fans. Commercial Extractor Fans
product_meta.description: Item Diameter String:30 InchesConsider all the pollution generated at your workplace every day – cleaning, burning fuel, smoke are the factors that create pollution you want to expel from your house. Installing an exhaust fan is the best way to get rid of these pollutants and breathe fresh air with ease and comfort. TPI Corporation Single Phase Wall Mount Commercial Circulator is the perfect solution to provide perfect ventilation and remove bad odor. The industrial fan features blade cages that meet workplace safety standards, as well as for precise placement to direct large volumes of air flow. This ventilation fan is used in warehouses, gyms, and other commercial environments.
feature_bullets: Durable Industrial Fan: ventilation fan is suitable for workplace environments. Features coated metal finish and ¼ HP lubricated motor, helps in protecting against environmental hazards, dirt and airborne debris or corrosive fumes. Features three speed settings for airflow rates up to 6,000 cubic feet per minute (CFM)

Utility: domestic exhaust fan helps in removing bad odor from the interiors. Ideal solution for use in bathrooms, kitchens, restroom, basements, warehouses. Removes stale odor, leaves a room fresh and healthy. Functions silently

Portable Exhaust Fan: TPI commercial circulator is lightweight and easy to carry. Three aluminum paddle blades attached to a steel hub and spider assembly for durability. Comes with a pull chain switch for switching on and off the exhaust fan with ease
Quick Installation: wall mount fan is easy to install. Simply attach the fan enclosure to the joist with screws. Take the help of a mechanic for quick installation

Cleaning and Maintenance: extractor vent fixture is easy to clean and maintain. Try using natural ingredients like baking soda and dish soap to sway grease and oil from the kitchen exhaust fan. Use a tooth brush for quick removal of stains

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
